title: Asparagus and Parma ham bruschetta
ingredients: ['200g asparagus tips, halved lengthways', '3 tbsp olive oil', '250g cherry tomatoes', '1 ciabatta loaf, diagonally sliced into 12', '1 garlic clove, halved', '50g wild rocket', '75g Parma ham, torn into small pieces', '25g fresh Parmesan, peeled into shavings']
